body_html:
I removed the directory, reinstalled everything from scratch, then got the 1st error:

INFO: From Compiling tensorflow/python/client/tf_session_helper.cc:
In file included from tensorflow/python/client/tf_session_helper.cc:1:
./tensorflow/python/client/tf_session_helper.h:6:10: fatal error: 'numpy/arrayobject.h' file not found
#include "numpy/arrayobject.h"
         ^
1 error generated.

What next?

body:

```
INFO: From Compiling tensorflow/python/client/tf_session_helper.cc:
In file included from tensorflow/python/client/tf_session_helper.cc:1:
```
